name: Time Chef
description:
Time Chef is a cooking game, where the player has the ability to speed time up. 

You play as a chef who runs a futuristic kitchen equipped with devices such as an autonomous cutting board and a robot dishwasher. The customers do not care that the kitchen is run by only one person, they want their food as soon as possible. And so, in order to satisfy as many customers as possible, you must use your "fast forward" ability to speed up the cooking process.
